creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
inscription: On inner box, top: 光琳写　住之江蒔絵　硯箱; inside cover, LL: 平安光石 | 光秋;  on writing box, cover:住の江の岸に寄る波よるさへや; inside cover: 夢の通ひ路人目; box, inside bottom: よくらむ {Suminoe no / kishi ni yoru nami / yoru sae ya / yume no kayoiji / hitome yoguramu (At Suminoe / the waves break upon the shore / even in the night / Like them will you soon draw near / along the pathway of dreams?)
markings:
round sticker on sides of both inner and outer boxes: LEWIS / 75 / COLLECTION;
sticker on corner of outer box lid: T-1291
medium: Black lacquer on kinji ground with inlays of simulated pewter and inlaid silver
signed: signed on the underside Mitsuaki hitsu (Brushed by Mitsuaki), and signed and sealed Heian Mitsuishi
title: Writing box
